data.eml:eml: Redescription and circumscription of the Acuminate Crayfish, Cambarus acuminatus Faxon, 1884 (Decapoda: Cambaridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Williams, Bronwyn W., Delekta, Emmy M., Loughman, Zachary J. (2019): Redescription and circumscription of the Acuminate Crayfish, Cambarus acuminatus Faxon, 1884 (Decapoda: Cambaridae). Zootaxa 4560 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4560.1.2
